column4: sooo it's pretty strange but I already have breezy - no new packages in apt so it seems that it is breezy
soooo my question is - what is default firewall solution for ubuntu?
well I know iptables are in almost every Linux
but my question was about default iptables-frontend solution
hmm so no firewall frontend in breezy (firestarter not in main repo)
then what about NetworkManager? not ready too?
firestarter is in the main repo
no it's not in main repo - shorewall is in main
yeah you are right its not in restricted
